subject: Lacrosse
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Cavaliers, still in mourning after the killing of Yeardley Love, were eliminated from the N.C.A.A. women’s lacrosse tournament by North Carolina.
snippet: The Cavaliers, still in mourning after the killing of Yeardley Love, were eliminated from the N.C.A.A. women’s lacrosse tournament by North Carolina.
